casebody.data:
COLUMBUS CITY SCHOOLS BD. OF EDN.
v.
FRANKLIN CTY. BD. OF REVISION 2018-1299 Supreme Court of Ohio. November 28, 2018

PETITION TO TRANSFER

On petition to transfer jurisdiction of Palmer House Borrower, L.L.C. Petition granted. The clerk shall issue an order for the transmittal of the records from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County and the Board of Tax Appeals, and the parties shall brief this case in accordance with the Rules of Practice of the Supreme Court of Ohio. O'DONNELL, J., dissents.
